article.title: Dannon Baker
article.content:
• Contact
![](/src/images/people/dannon.jpg)

Dannon is a software engineer in the Taylor Lab at Johns Hopkins University. He is an active member of the Galaxy project; Galaxy is a web-based platform for doing reproducible and transparent genomic research. Dannon's current efforts include work on a cloud computing deployment of Galaxy, and developing a flexible framework for automatic parallelism of tools within Galaxy. Dannon received his M.S. and B.S. in Computer Science from the Georgia Institute of Technology.

Contact
